snippet: Mr. Caesar was a force of nature who became one of television’s first stars in the early 1950s and influenced generations of comedians and comedy writers.

byline.original: By MERVYN ROTHSTEIN and PETER KEEPNEWS

lead_paragraph: Mr. Caesar was a force of nature who became one of television’s first stars in the early 1950s and influenced generations of comedians and comedy writers.

headline.main: Sid Caesar, Comic Who Blazed TV Trail, Dies at 91
